SkolarD FAQ /faq/ Recent content on SkolarD FAQ Hugo -- 0.147.5 en-us <<<<<<< HEAD FAQ /faq/faq/ Mon, 01 Jan 0001 00:00:00 +0000 /faq/faq/

Welcome to the SkolarD FAQ. Select a question from the list.

======= Mon, 26 May 2025 00:00:00 +0000 Booking a Session /faq/faq/booking/ Mon, 26 May 2025 00:00:00 +0000 /faq/faq/booking/

Browse Tutors

Filter by course, time slot, and rating.

Book a Session

Click Book Now and confirm time/date.

Cancel or Reschedule

Go to My Sessions → select → cancel or reschedule.

⚠️ 24-hour cancellation policy applies.

Contact Support /faq/faq/contact-support/ Mon, 26 May 2025 00:00:00 +0000 /faq/faq/contact-support/

Still stuck?

  • Email us: support@skolard.ca
  • Or use the in-app Support tab in your dashboard

We’re here to help you 9AM–5PM on weekdays.

Getting Started /faq/faq/getting-started/ Mon, 26 May 2025 00:00:00 +0000 /faq/faq/getting-started/

This guide will help new users register, log in, and begin using SkolarD.

How to Sign Up

  1. Click Sign Up on the homepage
  2. Choose “Student” or “Tutor”
  3. Enter your UManitoba email and set a password

Logging In

Use your email and password to access the dashboard.

✅ Must be a valid @myumanitoba.ca email.

Troubleshooting /faq/faq/troubleshooting/ Mon, 26 May 2025 00:00:00 +0000 /faq/faq/troubleshooting/

Common Issues

  • No email received?
    → Check spam or junk folders

  • Can’t log in?
    → Reset your password or ensure you used @myumanitoba.ca

  • Site loading issues?
    → Use Chrome, Firefox, or Edge. Clear browser cache.

Tutor Guide /faq/faq/tutor-guide/ Mon, 26 May 2025 00:00:00 +0000 /faq/faq/tutor-guide/

Set Availability

Use your dashboard to define open time slots.

Accept Bookings

Review incoming requests and confirm.

Update Profile

Add courses you tutor and write a short bio.
